class crefor.view.layouts.FlowLayout(parent=None, margin=0, spacing=-1)[source]¶

Bases: PySide.QtGui.QLayout

Custom layout that mimics the behaviour of a flow layout

addItem(item)[source]¶

Add an item at the end of the layout. This is automatically called when you do addWidget() item (QWidgetItem)

count()[source]¶

Get the number of items in the this layout @return (int)

doLayout(rect, testOnly)[source]¶

Layout all the items @param rect (QRect) Rect where in the items have to be laid out @param testOnly (boolean) Do the actual layout

expandingDirections()[source]¶

This layout grows only in the horizontal dimension

hasHeightForWidth()[source]¶

If this layout’s preferred height depends on its width @return (boolean) Always True

heightForWidth(width)[source]¶

Get the preferred height a layout item with the given width @param width (int)
